info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 9:14PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Elkhart, St. Joseph, southwestern Cass and southeastern Berrien Counties through 1000 PM EDT... At 913 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Buchanan, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... South Bend around 920 PM EDT. Georgetown and Roseland around 930 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Mishawaka, Gulivoire Park, Granger, Edwardsburg, Osceola, Elkhart and Simonton Lake. This includes Interstate 80 in Indiana between mile markers 62 and 90. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
